solution_line_template: There are a total of {patrons_from_cars} patrons who came in cars + {patrons_from_bus} from a bus = <<{patrons_from_cars}+{patrons_from_bus}={total_patrons_needing_ride}>>{total_patrons_needing_ride} patrons who need a ride to the main lot.

{patrons_per_cart} patrons can fit in each golf cart, so {total_patrons_needing_ride} patrons / {patrons_per_cart} in a cart = <<{total_patrons_needing_ride}/{patrons_per_cart}={total_carts_needed}>>{total_carts_needed} total carts.
